name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fake News to An Old Wives Tale

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fnaowt replaces 'Fake News' with 'An Old Wives Tale' and 'Fake' with 'Old Wives'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces "Fake News" with "An Old Wives Tale" and "Fake" with "Old Wives". Conceived by comedian Megan Simon (https://www.youtube.com/user/Theplayxmeganxplay) and built by comedian Wyatt Tall (http://www.psychclubpodcast.com/).
